title: Fresh Mango Salad
ingredients: ['2 green mangoes', 'Dressing', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 lime, juiced', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '1 tablespoon sesame or groundnut oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '30g roasted peanuts, crushed', 'I small red chilli, seeded and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, sliced', '4 spring onions, white parts only, chopped']
